biocontainers.name: clonalorigin
biocontainers.summary: Clonalorigin is a tool for recombination detection in bacteria. clonalorigin performs a comparative analysis of the sequences of a sample of bacterial genomes in order to reconstruct the recombination events that have taken place in their ancestry.

biotools.summary: ClonalOrigin is a tool for recombination detection in bacteria. ClonalOrigin performs a comparative analysis of the sequences of a sample of bacterial genomes in order to reconstruct the recombination events that have taken place in their ancestry.
